text: The Grace of God is a Canadian docudrama film, directed by Gerald L'Ecuyer and released in 1998."L'Ecuyer's Grace of God helps wrap up Image & Nation". Montreal Gazette, October 3, 1998. Centering on L'Ecuyer's identity as a gay man, the film unfolds as a series of vignettes depicting various key moments in his life, acted by a cast that includes Michael Riley, Steve Cumyn, Robbie Pennant, Alanna Cavanagh, David Bolt and David Cronenberg."The Grace Of God truly imaginative". Toronto Star, August 18, 1999. The film won the award for Best Canadian Film at the 1998 Inside Out Film and Video Festival."Stacey Donen: Hoping for discovery".
